Trigger.name: Compress

regexCodeList.string: ^(You) raise the pressure surrounding the already vulnerable form of (.+) to terrible heights, crushing the life from \w+\.$
^(You) raise the pressure surrounding (.+) to terrible heights, but \w+ manages to struggle free of your intangible grasp\.$
^(\w+) brings \w+ hands together in a resounding clap, but nothing seems to happen\.$
^(You) raise the pressure surrounding the unresponsive form of (.+) to terrible heights, seeking to crush the life from \w+\.$
^(\w+) brings \w+ hands together in a resounding clap, and blood begins to leak from the eyes of (.+)\.$
